title: Hitsuji-no-kaze
description: Very rare vegan bakery in Kyoto. Serves 30 to 40 kinds of hand-made-in-house breads. Try the one with Japanese green tea cream (cream is made of Japanese soy milk and 100% organic green tea also grown in Uji, Kyoto). Uses 100% Japanese flour, all handmade, spelt flour bread available, no refined sugar, all beet sugar. Located near Arashiyama where the famous Bamboo Forrest is located. You can easily access on your way back to the center of the city from the popular tourist site of Arashiyama.
